title: logging on  problem
body:
why i cant logging on to my account i type my user name and my password and then the small window login status  appear with  attempt to logging on and i wait like 5 mins or less  and then other window appear tell 
CONNECTION ERROR 
Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.

Information regarding what may have caused this error can be found here.

Service availability can be viewed on the League of Legends Server Status web page.
 wwwwwtttttttfffff what i should do ?????

replies.body: Your network needs to establish a connection to the login servers in order to authenticate your account.  It looks like you might be having some network trouble that's failing to make this connection.  As a first step, I recommend going over the series of instructions in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help.  This should get you fixed up, but let me know if you run into any trouble!
